alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus; Davie; Gaston; Iredell; Lincoln; Mecklenburg; Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 8:45PM EDT until May 26 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cabarrus County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Davie County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Southeastern Lincoln County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Iredell County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Mecklenburg County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Rowan County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Eastern Gaston County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northeastern York County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 845 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Yadkinville to 7 miles west of Mocksville to 9 miles north of Huntersville to 11 miles southwest of Uptown Charlotte, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Uptown Charlotte, Huntersville, Kannapolis, Downtown Concord, Salisbury, Statesville, Mocksville, Central Charlotte, Northeast Charlotte and Southwest Charlotte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.

area.areaDesc: Cabarrus; Davie; Gaston; Iredell; Lincoln; Mecklenburg; Rowan
